name: Vegan Sunbutter Granola Bars
description: No Bake Sunbutter Granola Bars. These 5 Ingredients Sunbutter Oatmeal Bars are great for snacking. Freezer friendly and versatile. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Soyfree Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup oats ((use certified gluten-free if needed) )
1 tsp non dairy milk or coconut oil

recipeInstructions.text: Line an 8 inch brownie pan with parchment. Toast the oats on a skillet/saucepan for 5 to 6 mins, over medium heat. Remove from the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Line an 8 inch brownie pan with parchment. Toast the oats on a skillet/saucepan for 5 to 6 mins, over medium heat. Remove from the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sunbutter and maple syrup and warm over medium low heat and mix. Warm to just about hot and well mixed. Take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sunbutter and maple syrup and warm over medium low heat and mix. Warm to just about hot and well mixed. Take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vanilla extract and mix in. Add the oats and mix in. Add a good pinch of salt if the sunbutter isnt salted.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vanilla extract and mix in. Add the oats and mix in. Add a good pinch of salt if the sunbutter isnt salted.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the mixture onto the prepared pan and spread it using a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the mixture onto the prepared pan and spread it using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the chocolate with 1 tsp non dairy milk in a double boiler or microwave (bursts of 10 seconds) Whisk until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the chocolate with 1 tsp non dairy milk in a double boiler or microwave (bursts of 10 seconds) Whisk until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle chocolate all over the bars. Freeze for half an hour, then slice and store.Refrigerate for upto a week, freeze for upto a month.
